channel.title: Hello again, actionTimer help? :)
channel.description: I need to make an actionTimer that teleports you out of my ClanWars game after 10 minutes. I've tried this several ways and all failed. They instantly teleported me to the waiting room instead of teleporting me after 10 minute period. Help please?

item.title: Hello again, actionTimer help? :)
item.dc:creator: @David_L_F David_L_F
item.description:
@David_L_F wrote:

Well I did that, it gave no errors but doesn’t work?

Read full topic

item.title: Hello again, actionTimer help? :)
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

David_L_F:

I need to make an actionTimer that teleports you out of my ClanWars game after 10 minutes. I’ve tried this several ways and all failed. They instantly teleported me to the waiting room instead of teleporting me after 10 minute period. Help please?

Make a timer…Find the value for 10minutes, then when you want it to start counting down, you put:

Timer = {value for 10 minutes here};

Then in process, you have to add a:

if (Timer == 0) {
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
heightLevel = #;
}

Read full topic
